ygData.subject: Re: Into the LIGHT!
ygData.msgSnippet: Silverbolt nodded as he listened to the words of the others, Noctorro and Airhammer standing on either side of him. The other Fuzors were off on other missions

Silverbolt nodded as he listened to the words of the others, Noctorro
and Airhammer standing on either side of him. The other Fuzors were
off on other missions or else they would also be here to witness this
event.

"Hrrmph." Noctorro said, not one for all those words and wishes. he
was a machine of action and combat. But he also turned to look at the
operation through the glass, his optics focused on Rodimus and Tuscon,
"Rodimus is made of the stuff of leaders and warriors. He will pull
through."

Airhammer though did pay heed to the words, "Hope is sometimes all we
have." He glanced at Noctorro, "Even for us."

Noctorro nodded.

*     *     *     *     *

In the medical bay itself Bump and Santon hooked the lines to Tuscon,
ensuring that they were secure. With a beep Tuscon's life signs began
displaying themselves on the monitors next to Rodimus' So far they
showed that Tuscon was in good condition at nearly full power.

Legacy came to stand between Rodimus and Tuscon as Bump and Santon
turned back to Rodimus with cutting tools in hand.

With a nod to Legacy Santon gave the order, and legacy pulled a
switch, and  almost immediately Tuscon's world began to swirl as
colors and sounds hit against him . . .
